tasks.task_description: Add --format json to container list command
Add --format json to image list command
Update parsing to use JSON instead of text tables
Add --all flag to show stopped containers
Add container inspect method to ContainerService
Add image inspect method to ImageService
Create InspectView component for showing JSON details
Create system status indicator in UI
Update sidebar to include new tabs

description: Implement read-only inspection features for container app
context: Added JSON formatting to both container and image list commands with proper JSON parsing

Verified that --all flag support and inspect methods for both containers and images are already implemented in the services. ContainerService has inspectContainer() and showAll parameter in listContainers(). ImageService has inspectImage().

Created InspectView component for displaying JSON data. Added inspect buttons to both ContainersListView and ImagesListView with sheet presentations. Added inspectContainer() and inspectImage() methods to respective ViewModels.
Added getSystemStatus() method to ContainerService. Created system status indicator in ContentView sidebar with traffic light colors (green/red/gray) showing system readiness.

Added volume and network support. Created VolumeInfo and NetworkInfo models. Added listVolumes/inspectVolume and listNetworks/inspectNetwork methods to ContainerService. Created VolumesViewModel, NetworksViewModel, VolumesListView, and NetworksListView with inspect functionality.
Added streamSystemLogs() method to ContainerService. Created SystemLogsViewModel and SystemLogsView with follow mode, auto-scroll, and clear functionality similar to container logs.
Updated ContentView sidebar to include all new tabs: Volumes, Networks, and System Logs. Updated SidebarItem enum with appropriate icons and titles for each section.
